name: Letswave 6
tagline: Letswave 6 - Matlab EEG signal processing toolbox
body:
### Welcome to Letswave.

Letswave is a free software toolbox to analyze electroencephalographic (EEG) and other neurophysiological signals. This new version has been rewritten entirely, taking into consideration structural limitations of Letswave 5.  As compared to existing signal processing toolboxes, emphasis is placed on intuitive and streamlined tools to process and visualize EEG data, with a shallow learning curve. The new version provides advanced scripting possibilities. 

### Authors and Contributors
The project is managed by André Mouraux (Institute of Neuroscience, Université catholique de Louvain, Belgium), in collaboration with Gan Huang and Bruno Rossion (Institute of Neuroscience, Université catholique de Louvain), Li Hu (Southwest University, China) and Giandomenico Iannetti (University College London, UK).

### Supported data formats
* DELTAMED Coherence
* Advanced Neuro Technologies (ANT) CNT
* Biosemi BDF
* European Data Format (EDF and EDF+)
* MEGA EEG
* EEGLAB SET
* Micromed TRC
* Brainvision VHDR

Alternatively, you can also import data as Matlab MAT files or exported ASCII files.
If you are unable to import your data format, submit an issue [here](https://github.com/NOCIONS/letswave6/issues/new).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
